assertion.name: change_details
assertion.value: A Correction to this paper has been published:

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Ethical approvals were obtained by the Institutional Review Board located at the university-affiliated hospital King’s Abdullah Hospital (Irbid-Jordan) and the Ministry of Health (Amman-Jordan), which also approved data gathering at the public hospital. One of the researchers explained the study and the research subject rights to the study participants who signed written consent forms prior to the data collection.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: free
assertion.value: This content has been made available to all.
